articles.description: India has won 17 medals, including nine gold, with four of them coming on Monday. India won two gold each in archery and shooting.
articles.content: Archers and shooters added four gold, one silver, and one bronze to India's medal tally on Monday at the World University Games to take the country up to the second spot behind table-topper China in … [+1330 chars]

articles.title: Hockey, Men’s Four Nations: Harmanpreet, Dilpreet score as India finish third with a win over Dutch - Scroll.in
articles.description: India will now travel to Chennai for the Asian Champions Trophy starting on Thursday.
articles.content: The Indian mens hockey team beat the reigning FIH Pro League Champions Netherlands 2-1 in the third-fourth placing match at the 100th Anniversary Spanish Hockey Federation International Tournament on… [+1988 chars]

articles.title: Indian Sports Calendar in 2023: Events to watch out for in first week of August - Khel Now
articles.description: With the Olympics cycle in full flow, a number of World Championships and other important events are lined up this week in the Indian Sports Calendar.
